set1:MonkeyEffect.NAME: Soutien Monkey
set1:MonkeyEffect.DESCRIPTION: Donne !VA! P et !VB! V à tous vos Monkeys.

set1:TemporalSnailKillEffect.NAME: Kill: Orb+
set1:TemporalSnailKillEffect.DESCRIPTION: Gain d'orbe à chaque ennemi tué.

set1:TemporalSnailRessurectEffect.NAME: Death: Ressurect Orb
set1:TemporalSnailRessurectEffect.DESCRIPTION: Peut ressusciter pour !C! orbe à sa mort. Le coût augmente de 1 à chaque utilisation.

set1:GodMonkeyHealEffect.NAME: Heal on Forest
set1:GodMonkeyHealEffect.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, heal !VA! HP on Forest Tiles.

set1:AbominationMonkeyEffect.NAME: Abomination Monkey
set1:AbominationMonkeyEffect.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ennemi Power by !VA! and Speed by !VB! on contact.

set1:MonkeyEffect.NAME: Support Monkeys
set1:MonkeyEffect.DESCRIPTION: All Monkeys gain !VA! P et !VB! V.

set1:TemporalSnailResurrectEffect.NAME: Infinity Loop
set1:TemporalSnailResurrectEffect.DESCRIPTION: Resurrect for !C! orbs. Increases the amount of orbs needed by 1 each time.
